subject: RE: [junit] ? access current test method name, in setUp() and tea rDown()
msgSnippet: this.toString() produces the method signature of the currently running test. -Jason ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
messageBody:
this.toString() produces the method signature of the currently running test.
-Jason

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Alain RAVET [mailto:aravet@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 23, 2001 9:03 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] ? access current test method name, in setUp() and
> tearDown()
>
>
> Hi,
>
> I wonder if there is a way to obtain the name of the
> current test method,
> when you are in setUp() or tearDown()?
>
>
> Usage :
>
>
> public void tearDown()
> {
> System.out.println ("You have just executed : " +
> <method_name_comes_here> ) ;
> printSomeInfoHere () ;
> }
>
>
> Alain Ravet
> Brussels, Belgium
>
